folder.name: Billy DataFlow/stop peeking in my folders, plz

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{_col0_} as integer,
		{_col1_} as string,
		Data as string,
		{_col3_} as string,
		{_col4_} as string,
		{_col5_} as string,
		{_col6_} as string,
		{_col7_} as string,
		{_col8_} as boolean,
		{_col9_} as boolean,
		{_col10_} as short,
		{_col11_} as short,
		{_col12_} as short,
		{_col13_} as short,
		{_col14_} as string,
		{_col15_} as integer,
		{_col16_} as integer,
		{_col17_} as short,
		{_col18_} as string,
		{_col19_} as double,
		{_col20_} as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> CrimeDataFile
CrimeDataFile derive(Data = left(Data,10),
		Time = right(Data,12)) ~> DataTimeExtract
DataTimeExtract aggregate(groupBy(DayOfWeek = dayOfWeek(toDate(Data,'yyyy-mm-dd'))),
	IUCR = count({_col3_})) ~> DayOfWeekCount
DataTimeExtract filter(month(toDate(Data)) == 4) ~> Only2016
Only2016 select(mapColumn(
		{_col0_},
		{_col1_},
		Data,
		{_col3_},
		Time
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DS_Crime2016_tw.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
DayOfWeekCount sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DS_CrimeByDayOfWeek_tw.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2

source(output(
		{_col0_} as integer,
		{_col1_} as string,
		Data as string,
		{_col3_} as string,
		{_col4_} as string,
		{_col5_} as string,
		{_col6_} as string,
		{_col7_} as string,
		{_col8_} as boolean,
		{_col9_} as boolean,
		{_col10_} as short,
		{_col11_} as short,
		{_col12_} as short,
		{_col13_} as short,
		{_col14_} as string,
		{_col15_} as integer,
		{_col16_} as integer,
		{_col17_} as short,
		{_col18_} as string,
		{_col19_} as double,
		{_col20_} as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> CrimeDataFile
CrimeDataFile derive(Data = left(Data, 10),
		Time = right(Data, 12)) ~> DateTimeExtract
DateTimeExtract aggregate(groupBy(DayOfWeek = dayOfWeek(toDate(Data,'yyyy-mm-dd'))),
	iucr = count({_col3_})) ~> DateOfWeekCount
DateTimeExtract filter(month(toDate(Data))==4) ~> Only2016
Only2016 select(mapColumn(
		{_col0_},
		{_col1_},
		Data,
		{_col3_}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DS_CrimeFileApril2020_gp'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
DateOfWeekCount sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DSCrimeByDOW_gp'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink222222

source(output(
		{_col0_} as integer,
		{_col1_} as string,
		Data as string,
		{_col3_} as string,
		{_col4_} as string,
		{_col5_} as string,
		{_col6_} as string,
		{_col7_} as string,
		{_col8_} as boolean,
		{_col9_} as boolean,
		{_col10_} as short,
		{_col11_} as short,
		{_col12_} as short,
		{_col13_} as short,
		{_col14_} as string,
		{_col15_} as integer,
		{_col16_} as integer,
		{_col17_} as short,
		{_col18_} as string,
		{_col19_} as double,
		{_col20_} as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> CrimeDataFile
CrimeDataFile derive(Data = left(Data,10),
		Time = right(Data,12)) ~> DataTypeExtract
DataTypeExtract aggregate(groupBy(DayOfWeek = dayOfWeek(toDate(Data,'yyyy-MM-dd'))),
	iucr = count({_col3_})) ~> DayOfWeekCount
DataTypeExtract filter(month(toDate(Data)) == 4) ~> Only2016
Only2016 select(mapColumn(
		{_col0_},
		{_col1_},
		Data,
		Time
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['CrimeFile2020_lt.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
DayOfWeekCount sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['CrimeByDayOfWeek_lt.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2

CrimeDataFile derive(Data = left(Data, 10),
		Time = right(Data, 12)) ~> DataTimeExtract
DataTimeExtract aggregate(groupBy(DayOfWeek = dayOfWeek(toDate(Data,'yyyy-mm-dd'))),
	iucr = count({_col3_})) ~> DayOfWeekCount
DataTimeExtract filter(month(toDate(Data)) == 4) ~> OnlyApril
OnlyApril select(mapColumn(
		{_col0_},

	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['crimeapril_DC.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,

	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['crimedayofweek_DC.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2

source(output(
		{_col0_} as integer,
		{_col1_} as string,
		data as string,
		{_col3_} as string,
		{_col4_} as string,
		{_col5_} as string,
		{_col6_} as string,
		{_col7_} as string,
		{_col8_} as boolean,
		{_col9_} as boolean,
		{_col10_} as short,
		{_col11_} as short,
		{_col12_} as short,
		{_col13_} as short,
		{_col14_} as string,
		{_col15_} as integer,
		{_col16_} as integer,
		{_col17_} as short,
		{_col18_} as string,
		{_col19_} as double,
		{_col20_} as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> CrimeDataFile
CrimeDataFile derive(data = left(data,10),
		time = right(data, 12)) ~> DataCrimeExtract
DataCrimeExtract aggregate(groupBy(DoW = dayOfWeek(toDate(data,'yyyy-mm-dd'))),
	ucr = count({_col3_})) ~> DayOfWeekCount
DataCrimeExtract filter(month(toDate(data))==6) ~> onlyApril
onlyApril select(mapColumn(
		{_col3_}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string,
		Column_14 as string,
		Column_15 as string,
		Column_16 as string,
		Column_17 as string,
		Column_18 as string,
		Column_19 as string,
		Column_20 as string,
		Column_21 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DS_onlyJune.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
DayOfWeekCount sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['CrimePerDoW.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
